text: ke m ng bamreu noh ban tb vinh tha tae anak nukkheunh ryyte nowpel del puok yeung ban samreak now kber phtang thm noh? pit brakd nasa khnhom ban phe l ch trei noh haey kmean norna mneak thveu aoy khnhom phe l ch romluk vea( brab anak) krawpi shai t n noh laey . haey vea ban nniel chaul tow knong samoutr yeang chamlek
